summary: This document contains correspondence from the U.S. Department of Justice regarding a law enforcement request for information about the incarceration records of Steven Hoffenberg and Berry Lester Kessler. It includes details about their sentences, projected release dates, and other relevant information maintained by the Federal Bureau of Prisons.

persons.name: Steven Hoffenberg
persons.context: Hoffenberg is referenced in relation to his incarceration records and projected release date.

persons.name: Berry Lester Kessler
persons.context: Kessler is mentioned alongside Hoffenberg regarding his incarceration records and details of his death.

persons.name: Henry J. Sadowski
persons.context: Sadowski is the author of the correspondence responding to the law enforcement request.

persons.name: Christina Pryor
persons.context: Pryor is the recipient of the correspondence regarding the law enforcement request.

connections.description: Both individuals are referenced in the context of their incarceration records.

events.title: Correspondence regarding incarceration records
events.description: The U.S. Department of Justice responds to a law enforcement request for information about the incarceration records of Steven Hoffenberg and Berry Lester Kessler.

events.title: Law Enforcement Request Received
events.description: The law enforcement request for information regarding Hoffenberg and Kessler was received by the agency.

keyFacts: Steven Hoffenberg's projected release date is October 12, 2013.
Berry Lester Kessler was scheduled for release on October 25, 2005, due to death.
The correspondence is dated November 29, 2010, and is a response to a request received on November 2, 2010.
Henry J. Sadowski is the Regional Counsel who authored the correspondence.
Christina Pryor is the FBI Special Agent to whom the correspondence is addressed.
